budget-line.ref: Financial Report 7th March 2016 total project budget for years one and two
budget-line.narrative: The project value is the amount transferred that was DiFD funded. The budget figure is for the total budget some of which was funded from sources other than DiFD. The amounts above have been funded and the project implemented within the agreed budget according to the log frame activities
